languages.text: {n}Дерзко блестят ясные, знакомые глаза флейтиста с нижних палуб. Ловкач, обманывающий дурней при помощи дрессированной крысы, насмешливо кивает вам.{/n} "Я так ждал этой встречи, Лорд-капитан".

{n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Дерзко блестят ясные, знакомые глаза флейтиста с нижних палуб. Ловкач, обманывающий дурней при помощи дрессированной крысы, насмешливо кивает вам.{/n} "Я так ждал этой встречи, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks gleam boldly. The con man who was playing tricks on fools with a trained rat nods at you mockingly."
{n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks gleam boldly. The con man who was playing tricks on fools with a trained rat nods at you mockingly."
{n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The great con man, who managed to play tricks on fools using only a trained rat, nods at you mockingly."
{n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The great con man, who managed to play tricks on fools using only a trained rat, nods at you mockingly."

{n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

{n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Die hellen, vertrauten Augen des Flötenspielers von den Unterdecks glitzern kühn. Der demütige Schwindler, der Narren mithilfe seiner trainierten Ratte über den Tisch gezogen hat, nickt dir jetzt spöttisch zu.{/n} "Ich habe auf dieses Zusammentreffen gewartet, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die hellen, vertrauten Augen des Flötenspielers von den Unterdecks glitzern kühn. Der demütige Schwindler, der Narren mithilfe seiner trainierten Ratte über den Tisch gezogen hat, nickt dir jetzt spöttisch zu.{/n} "Ich habe auf dieses Zusammentreffen gewartet, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Los ojos brillantes y familiares del flautista de las cubiertas inferiores muestran un destello de osadía. El humilde estafador que engañaba a los necios con ayuda de su rata entrenada asiente, burlón.{/n} «Esperaba que llegara este momento, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos brillantes y familiares del flautista de las cubiertas inferiores muestran un destello de osadía. El humilde estafador que engañaba a los necios con ayuda de su rata entrenada asiente, burlón.{/n} «Esperaba que llegara este momento, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}下位デッキからきたフルート吹きの、明るく見慣れた目がらんらんと輝く。かつて訓練したネズミを使って間抜けにイタズラをしていた卑しい詐欺師が、今は茶化すようにこちらに向かってうなずいた。{/n}「お会いできるのを待っていましたよ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}下位デッキからきたフルート吹きの、明るく見慣れた目がらんらんと輝く。かつて訓練したネズミを使って間抜けにイタズラをしていた卑しい詐欺師が、今は茶化すようにこちらに向かってうなずいた。{/n}「お会いできるのを待っていましたよ、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}底层甲板的吹笛人明亮的眼睛里闪烁着毫不畏惧的光芒。那个卑贱的骗子曾靠他训练有素的老鼠来捉弄那些蠢货，此刻却在嘲弄地向你点着头。{/n}“我一直都在期待这场会面，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}底层甲板的吹笛人明亮的眼睛里闪烁着毫不畏惧的光芒。那个卑贱的骗子曾靠他训练有素的老鼠来捉弄那些蠢货，此刻却在嘲弄地向你点着头。{/n}“我一直都在期待这场会面，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}Le regard brillant et familier du joueur de flûte des ponts inférieur luit d'une audace manifeste. L'humble escroc qui roulait les naïfs avec son rat dressé vous adresse à présent un signe de tête moqueur.{/n} « J'attendais impatiemment cette rencontre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard brillant et familier du joueur de flûte des ponts inférieur luit d'une audace manifeste. L'humble escroc qui roulait les naïfs avec son rat dressé vous adresse à présent un signe de tête moqueur.{/n} « J'attendais impatiemment cette rencontre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}Alt güvertelerdeki flütçünün aşina olduğun ışıltılı gözleri, cüretkârlık kıvılcımları saçıyor. Eğittiği sıçanının yardımıyla ahmakları kandıran mütevazı üçkâğıtçı, şimdi başını alaycı bir hâlde sana doğru eğiyor.{/n} "Bu karşılaşmayı dört gözle bekliyordum Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}The bright, familiar eyes of the flute player from the lower decks glint with boldness. The humble swindler who used to play tricks on fools with the help of his trained rat now nods at you mockingly.{/n} "I've been waiting for this meeting, Lord Captain."
